topic.title: * Application deployment in Kubernetes cluster.
topic.description: Implemented support for deployment of NMaaS tools in Kubernetes cluster - production-grade container orchestrator.

topic.title: * GitLab for tool instance config file storage.
topic.description: A dedicated GitLab repository is created to store deployed tool instance configuration files.

topic.title: * Helm chart for Oxidized application.
topic.description: Prepared Helm chart for Oxidized application for deployment in the Kubernetes cluster.

topic.title: * Support for NAV application.
topic.description: Implemented support for complete NAV application deployment workflow using Docker Compose.

topic.title: * Support for OpenNTI application.
topic.description: Implemented support for complete OpenNTI application deployment workflow using Docker Compose.

topic.title: * NMaaS Portal improvements.
topic.description: Added support for application comments and ratings. Implemented minor layout improvements.

topic.title: * Containerized application deployment using Docker Compose.
topic.description: Implemented support for Docker container deployment with dedicated network setup on the Docker Host using Docker Compose tool.

topic.title: * Support for LibreNMS application.
topic.description: Implemented support for complete LibreNMS application deployment workflow using Docker Compose.

topic.title: * Project setup.
topic.description: Prepared gradle multi module project and package structure for two main system components: platform and portal.

topic.title: * Containerized application deployment and configuration.
topic.description: Implemented support for Docker container deployment and configuration with dedicated network setup on the Docker Host using Docker Engine Remote API.

topic.title: * Secure data plane connectivity setup.
topic.description: Implemented client DCN/VPN configuration by means of Ansible playbooks execution.

topic.title: * Support for Oxidized application.
topic.description: Implemented support for complete Oxidized application deployment workflow.

topic.title: * Backend for NMaaS Portal.
topic.description: Implemented nmaas-portal API backend (part of the nmaas-platform) and integrated it with the rest of nmaas-platform.

topic.title: * First version of NMaaS Portal.
topic.description: Implemented first nmaas-portal web-based GUI supporting Oxidized application instance deployment.
